metadata.title: Dewangga Praxindo | DeFi Smart Contract Engineer
metadata.description: DeFi smart contract engineer with 3+ years experience. Building secure, scalable protocols on Ethereum, Arbitrum, and Solana. $50M+ TVL deployed.

hero.greeting: Hello, I'm Dewangga, a DeFi smart contract engineer building secure protocols with

about.label: What I Build
about.title: Full-Stack DeFi Engineering
about.description: I specialize in building secure, production-ready smart contracts and DeFi protocols. From Solidity on Ethereum and Arbitrum to Rust on Solana, I deliver battle-tested code with comprehensive security practices including fuzz testing, invariant testing, and audit preparation.

defi.title: DeFi Engineering
defi.description: Leverage vaults, LP management, yield strategies. Built protocols handling $50M+ TVL on Arbitrum.

multichain.title: Multi-Chain
multichain.description: Ethereum, Arbitrum, Solana, Polygon, Base. AAVE, Compound, Pendle, Uniswap integrations.

security.title: Security First
security.description: Fuzz testing, invariant testing. PeckShield audited.

zk.title: ZK & Privacy
zk.description: Zero-knowledge proofs with Noir circuits. Privacy-preserving verification.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Web3
fullstack.description: React, Next.js, TypeScript. From contracts to polished frontends.
